This problem demonstrates a bug in the Rapid Response code.
If the answer text includes a Unicode character, such as λ, the users gets an error message and the response isn't recorded.
If the answer text only has ASCII characters, it behaves normally.
>>Try each one and confirm that you can reply with the first answer, but not the others<<
